name: 1980s Movies, Part Five Quiz | 1980s Movies | 15 Questions

questions.text: In the 1986 movie "Fire with Fire", why was Joe Fisk sent to boys detention camp?
questions.correct: He drove a car through a window
options: He got caught stealing a car
questions.explanation:
He drove a car through a window.

	Joe didn't like the way that his mother's boyfriend treated her so he drove a car through a window.  This film starred Craig Sheffer and Virginia Madsen.

questions.text: What was the name of Katie's little sister in the 1989 comedy "She's Out of Control"?
questions.explanation:
Bonnie.

	Laura Mooney portrayed Bonnie Simpson.  She went on in her career to do voiceovers in the cartoons such as "Animaniacs" and "Winnie the Pooh: Seasons of Giving".

questions.text: What popular actor portrayed Johnny Maine in the 1984 movie "Grandview USA"?
questions.explanation:
John Cusack.

	John Cusack also appeared in the extremely popular teen movie from 1984 "Sixteen Candles".  His most recent films include "Identity" (2003) and "Runaway Jury" (2003).

questions.text: How many films during the 1980's did John Cusack and Joan Cusack star in together?
questions.explanation:
5.

	John and Joan were in the following films together in the 1980s: "Class" (1983); "Sixteen Candles" (1984); "Grandview USA" (1984); "Broadcast News" (1987); and "Say Anything..." (1989).

questions.text: Which following films from 1983 did Alan Ruck make his big screen debut in as Carl Brennan?
questions.explanation:
Bad Boys.

	This 1983 drama about a rebellious teenager who gets sent to reform school starred Sean Penn, Esai Morales, and Ally Sheedy.

questions.text: What kind of sandwich was Chet going to serve to Gary in a dirty ashtray in the 1985 comedy "Weird Science"?
questions.explanation:
Pork.

	"How about a nice greasy, pork sandwich served in a dirty ashtray."  Chet was trying to make Gary puke because he knew that he and Wyatt had been drinking.

questions.text: What was the name of the character that Randall "Tex" Cobb portrayed in the 1987 Coen brothers comedy "Raising Arizona"?
questions.explanation:
Leonard Smalls.

	Randall "Tex" Cobb played the bounty hunter that was hired by the Arizona's to find their kidnapped Nathan Jr.

questions.text: Karen Kopins who starred as Robin in "Once Bitten"(1985), played the role of Susan Granger in what 1980s dance flick?
questions.explanation:
Fast Forward.

	"Fast Forward" was about a group of small town kids who head for the big city of New York in hopes of making it big on the dance circuit.  This film also starred John Scott Clough and Don Franklin.

questions.text: Which of the following films did Michael Caine NOT star in during the 1980s?
questions.explanation:
California Suite.

	"Hannah and Her Sisters", "Sweet Liberty", and "Half Moon Street" were all released in 1986.  "California Suite" was released in 1978.  Michael starred opposite Maggie Smith as a closet gay man who is married to a popular film actress.

questions.text: "Police Academy 4:  Citizens on Patrol", "Amazon Women on the Moon", and "Three Men and a Baby" starred which of the following actors?
questions.explanation:
Steve Guttenberg.

	Steve Guttenberg starred in four films in the "Police Academy" series.  He took a break from acting in the early 1990's.  He was not in any major films from 1991 to 1994.

questions.text: What was the alternative spelling of "Beetlejuice" in the 1988 movie of the same name?
questions.explanation:
Betelgeuse.

	You had to say his name three times for him to appear.  Adam and Barbara were having trouble knowing how to pronounce his name.  It came out sounding like "betel geyes".

questions.text: Which of the following actors was not in the 1982 romantic comedy "Tootsie"?
questions.explanation:
Michael Caine.

	Sydney Pollack played Michael's agent and also directed this 1982 box office hit.  George Gaynes played John Van Horn, Emily Kimberly's love interest on the soap opera.  Charles Durning was Les, Julie's father.

questions.text: What color of Reebok tennis shoes did Whoopi Goldberg's character, Terry Dolittle, wear in the 1986 comedy "Jumpin'Jack Flash"?
questions.explanation:
Yellow.

	She had the whole yellow scheme going on, she even had a matching scarf to go with it.

questions.text: Gene Wilder starred opposite this beauty in the 1984 romantic comedy "The Woman in Red"?
questions.explanation:
Kelly LeBrock.

	Kelly LeBrock gained her fame for modeling.  She played a supermodel in this romantic comedy about a happily married man who tries to get some much needed excitement in his life.  This film co-starred Charles Grodin, Joseph Bologna, and Gilda Radner.

questions.text: The 1980 romantic comedy "Seems Like Old Times" starred which of the following stars?
questions.explanation:
Goldie Hawn and Chevy Chase.

	This comedy duo also starred in the 1978 romantic comedy "Foul Play".
